scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run -w backend lint && npm run -w frontend lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm exec -w backend eslint "src/**/*.{ts,tsx}" --fix && npm run -w frontend lint:fix
scripts.format: npm exec -w backend prettier --write . && npm run -w frontend format
scripts.format:check: npm exec -w backend prettier --check . && npm run -w frontend format:check
